summary: In this David and Goliath story for the 21st century, a group of proud Scottish homeowners take on celebrity tycoon Donald Trump as he buys up one of Scotland's last wilderness areas to build a golf resort.
cast: Anthony Baxter|Kevin Brown|Paul Cheshire|Mickey Foote|Michael Forbes|Molly Forbes|Sheila Forbes|Walter Forbes|Martin Ford|Ian Francis|Martin Glegg|Paul Holleran|Audrey Kennedy|David Kennedy|David Letterman|Emily Maitlis|Sarah Malone Bates|David McCue|David Milne|Susan Munro|Paul O'Connor|Richard Phinney|Peter Riegert|Alex Salmond|Charles Skene|George Sorial|Stewart Spence|Donald Trump Jr.|Donald Trump|Andy Wightman|Stephanie Williams|Ian Wood|Nicola Sturgeon
title: You've Been Trumped
